scripts.test:coverage:jest: jest --config tests/jest.config.js --coverage && mkdir -p tests/coverage && cp -r coverage tests/coverage/jest/
scripts.test:coverage:cucumber: nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --reporter=text-summary --report-dir=tests/coverage/cucumber cucumber-js tests/features/signin.feature tests/features/signup.feature tests/features/signin.negative.feature tests/features/signup.negative.feature tests/features/meeting.feature tests/features/meeting.negative.feature --require tests/features/step-definitions/ --require tests/features/support/ --format progress-bar --config tests/cucumber.js
scripts.test:coverage:merge: npm run test:coverage:jest && npm run test:coverage:cucumber && node tests/merge-coverage.js
scripts.test:cucumber: cucumber-js tests/features/signin.feature tests/features/signup.feature tests/features/signin.negative.feature tests/features/signup.negative.feature tests/features/meeting.feature tests/features/meeting.negative.feature --require tests/features/step-definitions/ --require tests/features/support/ --format progress-bar --config tests/cucumber.js
